Validates an email address

  • Constructor Details

    • EmailValidator

      public EmailValidator()

  • Method Details

    • getDomain

      public java.lang.String getDomain()
      Returns:
      domain part of the last validated email address or null if validation was unsuccessful

    • getUsername

      public java.lang.String getUsername()
      Returns:
      local-part of the last validated email address or null if validation was unsuccessful

    • validate

      public void validate​(java.lang.String email) throws ValidationException
      Validates the email address Sets username and domain fields according to the last validated address or throws ValidationException
      Specified by:
      validate in interface IValidator
      Parameters:
      email - email address to be validated
      Throws:
      NullEmailException - if email is null
      EmailWithoutAtSymbolException - if email doesn't contain @ symbol
      EmailContainsInvalidSymbolsException - if username contains disallowed symbols
      EmailHasInvalidDomainException - if domain part is not valid
      ValidationException - if validation is unsuccessful
